My score on RGB Color Challenge game!

From Wikipedia : The RGB color model is an additive color model in which red, green, and blue light are added together in various ways to reproduce a broad array of colors. The name of the model comes from the initials of the three additive primary colors, red, green, and blue. 

In computers, the component values are often stored as integer numbers in the range 0 to 255. 

 (255, 0, 0) : perfect red
(0, 255, 0) : perfect green
(0, 0, 255) : perfect blue

 So, the rules of the game are very simple : you have to find the right color, most often as a result, according to his RGB value specified between the brackets.
